text: Eteke tumi ekanistha hai nija mukhamandalaka dbinata pratisthita rakha. Allahara phitarata (sbabharaika raiti ba dbina ichalama), yara oparata (calara upayukta karai) te'om manuhaka srsti karaiche; allahara srstira kono paraibartana na'i. E'itorae'i supratisthita dbina; kintu adhikansa manuhe'i seya najane
